definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: All the experiments I report were made using the cosmic ray test system.
sentences.chinese: 本論文的全部實驗工作都是基於宇宙線測試完成的。

sentences.english: This radiation possibly is a source of cosmic rays.
sentences.chinese: 這種輻射可能成爲宇宙線的一個源。

sentences.english: The search for gamma ray point sources is a popular topic in the study of cosmic rays.
sentences.chinese: 點源的尋找是宇宙線研究中的一個熱門課題。
